name: Simple 1500 Series Vol. 29: The Tsuri
overview: Simple 1500 Series vol. 29 - The Tsuri is a first person perspective fishing game That features 5 different main fishing spots (with different part of each fishing spot for the player to choose where to fish) in places like rivers, ponds, etc. The game is about fishing freshwater fishes, there are 2 games modes: Free mode and challenge mode. The free mode is just choose a spot and go to fish there. In the challenge mode the game challenge the player to catch a fish with a specific weight. The game uses a close-up fish perspective to show the fight of the fish with the fisherman.
